song_lyrics: Bhārat kī ham shān hai, Swāmī kī santān hai,
Akṣhar-Puruṣhottam ke ham sab, kal ke nojavān hai.​
Swāminārāyaṇ gāyenge, Akṣhardhām jāyenge...
Bhāgya hamāre Bhāratme is manuṣhya kī tanu pāī,
Pramukh Swāmīne god līe aur jīvan rīt sīkhāī,
Mānav ke sanskār dān me ham sabake agavān hai,
Akṣhar-Puruṣhottam ke...
Gāv gāv ham jāyenge, Akṣharnād gajāyenge...
Āj vishva me Swāminārāyaṇ nād uṭhā hai bhārī,​
Mānav ke ur me Swāmīne sanskṛuti jyot jalāī,​
Satya ahinsā brahmacharya aur upāsanā kī shān hai,
Akṣhar-Puruṣhottam ke...
Dharma rāh par jāyenge, sabko amī pī lāyenge...
Shrījī Guṇātīt Bhagatjī Shāstrījī Yogījī,​
Pragaṭ mīle hai āj hame yah dekho Pramukh Swāmījī,
Āj hazāro yuvā kishoro unke par kurbān hai,
Akṣhar-Puruṣhottam ke...
Brahmarup ho jāyenge, shāshvat sevā pāyenge...
Bhārat kī ham shān hai...
Swāminārāyaṇ gāyenge, Akṣhardhām jāyenge..
Bhārat kī ham shān hai...
title: Bhāratkī ham shān hai Swāmīkī santān hai

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-3061: Sadhu Aksharjivandas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
